Resource Classes¶

Producers and consumers are all resources.

Resource¶

class rgma.Resource¶

A producer or consumer.

close()¶
Closes the resource. The resource will no longer be available through this API and will be destroyed once it has finished interacting with other components. It is not an error if the resource does not exist.
destroy()¶
Closes and destroys the resource. The resource will no longer be available to any component. It is not an error if the resource does not exist.

ResourceEndpoint¶

class rgma.ResourceEndpoint(urlString, resourceId)¶

A resource endpoint contains a URL and a resource ID.

Parameters:
  • urlString (string) – the service URL
  • resourceId (int) – the resource identifier
getResourceId()¶

Gets the resource identifier.

Returns:return the resourceId as an int
getUrlString()¶

Gets the resource URL.

Returns:the resource URL as a string
